title: Tower Defence
description: A browser-based tower defence game featuring strategic gameplay, multiple levels, upgradeable towers, and responsive UI.

description_i18n.en: A browser-based tower defence game featuring strategic gameplay, multiple levels, upgradeable towers, and responsive UI.
description_i18n.zh: 一款基于浏览器的塔防游戏，包含策略玩法、多关卡、可升级防御塔及响应式界面。
description_i18n.ms: Permainan pertahanan menara berasaskan pelayar dengan strategi, berbilang tahap, menara boleh dinaik taraf, dan UI responsif.

title: Image Generator
description: An image generator app with prompt-based rendering, gallery preview, and downloadable outputs.

description_i18n.en: An image generator app with prompt-based rendering, gallery preview, and downloadable outputs.
description_i18n.zh: 一款基于提示生成图像的应用，支持图库预览与下载。
description_i18n.ms: Aplikasi penjana imej berasaskan arahan dengan pratonton galeri dan muat turun.

title: Godot Game
description: A game developed using the Godot Engine with showcase images.

description_i18n.en: A game developed using the Godot Engine with showcase images.
description_i18n.zh: 使用 Godot 引擎开发的游戏，展示核心玩法与画面。
description_i18n.ms: Permainan dibangunkan dengan enjin Godot yang memaparkan permainan dan visual.

title: AI Car
description: An AI-driven car project featuring vision-based tracking and autonomous navigation.

description_i18n.en: An AI-driven car project featuring vision-based tracking and autonomous navigation.
description_i18n.zh: 一个基于 AI 的智能小车项目，支持视觉跟踪与自主导航。
description_i18n.ms: Projek kereta AI dengan penjejakan berasaskan visi dan navigasi autonomi.
